医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
预测阿尔茨海默氏症衰退：新模型为患者提供个性化见解研究人员开发了一种模型，利用临床和生物标志物数据预测阿尔茨海默氏症患者的认知能力下降，从而改进个性化治疗计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Predicting-Alzheimers-decline-New-model-offers-personalized-insights-for-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Predicting-Alzheimers-decline-New-model-offers-personalized-insights-for-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a119aa5d-6084-421e-9247-4e599b4d5dcf Tue, 16 Jul 2024 22:20:00 -0400 Predicting Alzheimer's decline: New model offers personalized insights for patients
研究人员发现 ORF6 蛋白是 SARS-CoV-2 免疫逃避的关键《Cell》杂志上发表的一篇文章描述了一项研究，该研究使一组研究人员能够通过识别一种名为 ORF6 的蛋白质（该机制中的关键因素）来发现 SARS-CoV-2 如何逃避细胞毒性免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Researchers-identify-ORF6- Protein-as-key-to-SARS-CoV-2-immune-evasion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Researchers-identify-ORF6- Protein-as-key-to-SARS-CoV-2-immune-evasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e0b1044-f3f2-4120-aef7-af6be8c9cddc Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:59:37 -0400 Researchers identify ORF6 protein as key to SARS-CoV-2 immune evasion
每日补充可能有助于晚期干性 AMD 患者保护视力在一项新的数据分析中，美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员发现，每日服用含有抗氧化维生素和矿物质的补充剂可以减缓晚期干性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 的进展，可能对晚期干性黄斑变性 (AMD) 患者有所帮助。阶段疾病保留了他们的中心视力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Daily-supplement-may-help-preserve-vision-in-people-with-late-stage-dry-AMD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Daily-supplement-may-help-preserve-vision-in-people-with-late-stage-dry-AMD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7de4a824-955d-4f4a-9405-7274eabc7025 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:54:16 -0400 Daily supplement may help preserve vision in people with late-stage dry AMD
大量减肥可以改善肥胖者的新陈代谢、情绪和决策能力严重超重（肥胖）的人不仅表现出危险行为的改变，而且新陈代谢和心理也发生变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Massive-weight-loss-improves-metabolism-mood-and-decision-making-in-obese-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Massive-weight-loss-improves-metabolism-mood-and-decision-making-in-obese-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=552da7fd-0f3a-41d0-aefe-5e443217cfb6 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:47:10 -0400 Massive weight loss improves metabolism, mood, and decision-making in obese individuals
平板电脑的使用会扰乱幼儿的共同注意力和语言发展最近的一项研究表明，幼儿使用平板电脑会干扰共同注意力和行为反应，可能会阻碍他们的语言和社交发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Tablet-use-disrupts-toddlers-joint-attention-and-language-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Tablet-use-disrupts-toddlers-joint-attention-and-language-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=485af72d-bf15-4ba6-b99a-3393745f05ab Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:47:00 -0400 Tablet use disrupts toddlers' joint attention and language development
研究表明，排便频率与长期健康有关每个人都会大便，但不是每天都会。系统生物学研究所 (ISB) 的新研究表明，排便频率与长期健康有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bowel-movement-Frequency-is-linked-to-long-term-health-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bowel-movement-Frequency-is-linked-to-long-term-health-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67315619-fe63-466c-880b-d6339bc789ba Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:40:30 -0400 Bowel movement frequency is linked to long-term health, study suggests
新的皮质表面模板可提高神经影像数据分析的准确性人脑负责关键功能，包括感知、记忆、语言、思维、意识和情感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-cortical-surface-template-provides-greater-accuracy-in-analyzing-neuroimaging-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-cortical-surface-template-provides-greater-accuracy-in-analyzing-neuroimaging-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d040e3f-7139-4e95-92fa-08cddcf63822 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:31:35 -0400 New cortical surface template provides greater accuracy in analyzing neuroimaging data
威尔康奈尔研究人员通过机器学习定义了帕金森病的三种亚型威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员使用机器学习根据疾病进展的速度来定义帕金森病的三种亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Weill-Cornell-researchers-define- Three-Parkinsons-subtypes-with-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Weill-Cornell-researchers-define- Three-Parkinsons-subtypes-with-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe76c76a-0cf2-4afd-81b7-eeccc9f06248 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:26:55 -0400 Weill Cornell researchers define three Parkinson's subtypes with machine learning
新研究旨在研究睡眠模式如何影响老年女性的神经认知据美国疾病控制与预防中心称，阿尔茨海默病是最常见的痴呆症，目前影响女性的人数是男性的两倍，预计未来几年少数族裔的病例将出现最显着的增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-study-aims-to-examine-how-sleep-patterns-affect-neurocognition-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-study-aims-to-examine-how-sleep-patterns-affect-neurocognition-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7b28648-b047-483b-9614-c1cdaae80bc1 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:21:12 -0400 New study aims to examine how sleep patterns affect neurocognition in older women
古细菌：人类微生物组和传染病中看不见的参与者古细菌是人类微生物组的关键参与者，与多种疾病有关，但其致病潜力仍然是推测性的。这项研究强调了它们在牙周炎和胃肠道感染等疾病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Archaea-Unseen-players-in- human-microbiome-and-infectious-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Archaea-Unseen-players-in- human-microbiome-and-infectious-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86bc181e-e108-45fd-a058-3dc7eea44e23 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 21:20:00 -0400 Archaea: Unseen players in human microbiome and infectious diseases
